sql.name: 获取用户类型供选择
sql.content: SELECT a.id as 'id',a.role_name as 'text' ,a.role_desc as 'desc' FROM t_role a WHERE not exists (select b.id from t_role b where b.role_type = 'S' and a.id = b.id) UNION SELECT a.id as 'id',a.role_name as 'text' ,a.role_desc as 'desc' FROM t_role a WHERE a.role_type = 'S' AND 'u8952c8666964e07a9a285b10d706a61' = ':userId'

sql.name: 检查用户名是否存在
sql.content: SELECT COUNT(*) as countNum FROM t_user WHERE id != ':userId' AND user_name = ':userName'

sql.name: 修改用户
sql.content: UPDATE t_user set user_name=':userName', full_name=':fullName',id_number=':idCard', org_id=':orgId', contact_number=':contactNumber', role_id=':roleId',sex=':sex', birthday=':birthday' WHERE id = ':userId'

sql.name: 获取有效的用户列表
sql.content: SELECT u.id, u.user_name, u.full_name, u.org_id, o.org_name, u.contact_number, u.role_id, r.role_name, u.status FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_org o ON u.org_id = o.id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON u.role_id = r.id WHERE u.status IN ('N','R') [ AND instr(u.user_name,':userName') > 0 ] ORDER BY u.create_date DESC

sql.name: 获取删除的用户列表
sql.content: SELECT u.id, u.user_name, u.full_name, u.org_id, o.org_name, u.contact_number, u.role_id, r.role_name, u.status FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_org o ON u.org_id = o.id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON u.role_id = r.id WHERE u.status IN ('D') [ AND instr(u.user_name,':userName') > 0 ] ORDER BY u.create_date DESC

sql.name: 根据ID获取用户
sql.content: SELECT u.id, u.user_name, u.full_name,u.id_number,u.birthday,u.sex, u.org_id, o.org_name, u.contact_number, u.role_id, r.role_name, u.status, u.password, u.init_password FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_org o ON u.org_id = o.id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON u.role_id = r.id WHERE u.id = ':userId'

sql.name: 获取系统工程师的用户列表
sql.content: SELECT u.id, u.user_name, u.full_name, u.org_id, o.org_name, u.contact_number, u.role_id, r.role_name, u.status FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_org o ON u.org_id = o.id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON u.role_id = r.id WHERE u.status IN ('N','R') AND r.role_type='E' [ AND instr(u.user_name,':userName') > 0 ] ORDER BY u.create_date DESC

sql.name: 获取验证码的使用用户
sql.content: SELECT u.id, u.user_name, u.full_name, u.org_id, o.org_name, u.contact_number, u.role_id, r.role_name, u.status FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_org o ON u.org_id = o.id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON u.role_id = r.id WHERE u.status IN ('N','R') [ AND instr(u.user_name,':userName') > 0 ] ORDER BY u.create_date DESC

sql.name: 获取施工经理的用户列表
sql.content: SELECT u.id, u.user_name, u.full_name, u.org_id, o.org_name, u.contact_number, u.role_id, r.role_name, u.status FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_org o ON u.org_id = o.id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON u.role_id = r.id WHERE u.status IN ('N','R') AND r.role_type='B' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT p.user_id FROM t_project_personnel p WHERE p.project_id = ':projectId' AND p.user_id = u.id ) [ AND instr(u.user_name,':userName') > 0 ] ORDER BY u.create_date DESC

sql.name: 获取用户的项目
sql.content: SELECT p.id,p.project_name FROM t_project p LEFT JOIN t_project_personnel pp on p.id = pp.project_id WHERE p.status = 'I' AND pp.user_id = ':userId'

sql.name: 获取用户的菜单
sql.content: SELECT id, menu_name,menu_code,menu_url,icon_url,parent_id FROM t_menu m WHERE EXISTS (SELECT res_id FROM t_role_res r WHERE m.id = r.res_id AND res_type = 'm' AND role_id = ':roleId' ) ORDER BY m.order_num ASC

sql.name: 修改用户密码
sql.content: UPDATE t_user set password = ':newPassword', init_password = ':initPassword' WHERE id = ':userId'

sql.name: 删除用户
sql.content: UPDATE t_user set status = 'D' WHERE id = ':userId'

sql.name: 恢复用户
sql.content: UPDATE t_user set status = 'R' WHERE id = ':userId'

sql.name: 获取工单工程师的用户列表
sql.content: SELECT u.id, u.user_name, u.full_name, u.org_id, o.org_name, u.contact_number, u.role_id, r.role_name, u.status FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_org o ON u.org_id = o.id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON u.role_id = r.id WHERE u.status IN ('N','R') AND (r.role_type = 'E' [OR r.role_type=':roleType2'] [OR r.role_type=':roleType4']) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT id FROM t_machine_box b WHERE b.id = ':machineBoxId' AND (u.id = b.install_engineer OR u.id = b.debug_engineer)) ORDER BY u.create_date DESC
